amazing how so many of you can't figure this out.  Install is SIMPLE. Double click the .dmg, it mounts and then you drag it to your applications folder.  Plug in the serial and it's already cracked.  No need for Little Snitch.  OBW and DeGun THANK YOU for upping such a killer product & keep up the good work!
